<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add an API token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/user/{userID}/token"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Add an API token

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userID","description":"User ID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"APIToken JSON object","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tokenName":{"type":"string","example":"my-super-secret-token","description":"user specified token name","readOnly":false},"token":{"type":"string","example":"adsf98ashdkjh3689adsfnj3$ADn","description":"API Token.  Minimum 32 characters. This token is encrypted in the database and can not be retrieved once set","readOnly":false,"writeOnly":true}},"title":"APIToken"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"API Token added","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"tokenName":{"type":"string","example":"my-super-secret-token","description":"user specified token name","readOnly":false},"token":{"type":"string","example":"adsf98ashdkjh3689adsfnj3$ADn","description":"API Token.  Minimum 32 characters. This token is encrypted in the database and can not be retrieved once set","readOnly":false,"writeOnly":true}},"title":"APIToken"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request"},"401":{"description":"Authorization required"},"403":{"description":"Access denied"},"404":{"description":"Item not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
